video.title: The Queen and the Conqueror
video.synopsis: Years after Spanish conquistador Pedro de Heredia betrayed her people and broke her heart, indigenous woman Catalina reenters his life to get revenge.

episodes.synopsis: An indigenous woman kidnapped by a conquistador returns to her tribe, helped by her Spanish lover, but a turn of events destroys her trust in him.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Pedro frees Catalina and the two escape, but not without serious injury. As Pedro nurses Catalina, a bond develops between them.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When the mine's owner comes to visit, Pedro takes a risk and proposes an idea that could benefit everyone. Nicuesa puts the convent under surveillance.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When the governor orders Catalina's return to Nicuesa, Father Bartolomé and Catalina appear before the government official to plead their case.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Pedro returns and finds Mencía beaten, he attacks Linares. But in the ensuing scuffle, Fernando is accidentally shot, and Pedro must save him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Beatriz offers Andrés intel, in exchange for her passage on a ship. Nicuesa's men abduct Enriquillo and hold him for a ransom: Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Pedro helps Catalina escape from the ship, but once on land again, he's captured by Andrés, who believes it was Pedro who led the slave rebellion.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: With help from Mencía, Beatriz, and Father Bartolomé, Pedro is rescued from his executioners and stowed away on a ship with Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Badillo agrees to help Catalina find her tribe, but wants her help in return. Meanwhile, Pedro returns to Spain to save his brother from execution.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: To save Alberto's life, Pedro orders Alonso to offer Azula a deal. Badillo's wife manipulates Catalina into going on a fool's errand.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: As Pedro's trial begins, his life depends on whether Constanza was able to find a person of influence to help him. Catalina joins forces with Etoc.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Badillo refuses to sign a confession to ensure his wife's safe return, forcing Catalina and Etoc to change strategy. Pedro sets sail for the New World.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Constanza sets out to forge a friendship with Pedro's sister-in-law. Pedro arrives in Santa Marta, where he must play hardball for Catalina's release.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Constanza asks Inés if she knows anyone trustworthy to be Sol's new nanny. Pedro founds the town of Cartagena, and reunites Catalina with her tribe.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: A shocking turn of events leaves Catalina feeling betrayed and vowing revenge, while Pedro finds himself a captive on his own ship.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Pedro immediately sets sail again to go back to the New World, a stunned and desperate Constanza makes Alberto an offer he can't refuse.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Sol sets out to change her mother's mind about moving to Spain. Catalina arrives in Cartagena to get revenge. Alberto makes plans behind Pedro's back.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: When Juan sees through Sol's act, she makes a deal with him instead. Catalina finds an escort for the party, where she comes face-to-face with Pedro.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: When Sol's plan fails and she runs away, Catalina offers to help find her. Held captive, Alberto and his guide are told they must earn their freedom.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When their search for Sol takes them into the jungle's privacy, Catalina unleashes her fury at Pedro. Father Sancho takes advantage of Pedro's absence.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Alonso tries to make the townspeople remember how Pedro helped them in the past. Catalina tracks down Juan and demands to know where Sol is.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Sol and Catalina scramble to protect Juan from Pedro. When Alberto refuses to abandon his plans of rescuing Sanya, Gonzalo takes a preventative measure.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: During the council's vote on whether to oust Pedro as governor of Cartagena, Catalina takes steps to give the impression that she's on Pedro's side.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After giving the newcomers a warm welcome to her mine, Rebeca reveals her dark side. Inés overhears Sol blaming herself for Manolo's injury.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Father Sancho's surprising decision about Juan makes Pedro suspect that the priest is being manipulated. Rebeca forces Alberto to lead an expedition.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Father Sancho moves into the governor's residence. Sol begins to suspect that Manolo is faking his coma, so she tests her theory. Juan's trial begins.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Catalina falsifies an official document to make Pedro worry and seek her help, and drives a wedge between him and Alonso.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: When Catalina realizes Father Sancho is suspicious and watching her, she has Juan visit Pedro as her go-between. Sol announces plans to her parents.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Inés shares her suspicions about Catalina with Alonso. Sol meets the head of the convent. An injured woman arrives in Cartagena, repeating Pedro's name.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Pedro insists on meeting the newly arrived judge. Alberto finally finds what he's been looking for. Sol receives an unexpected visitor at the convent.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Catalina learns of Sanya's predicament and seizes it as a chance for Pedro to win back the townspeople's favor. Rebeca puts the gold dagger to use.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: When Pedro's trial starts, Catalina is unable to hide her burning anger in the courtroom. Azucena secretly visits Sol, who's in solitary confinement.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Pedro is given the judges' verdict. Catalina asks Father Bartolomé for one last favor. Constanza visits the convent and insists on seeing her daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Catalina works on winning the favor and trust of an unlikely person: Constanza. Inés has a falling out with her family.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Catalina manipulates Constanza into making a big decision without consulting Pedro. A miraculous find brings Alberto closer to Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: A novitiate shares her suspicions about Sol with Mother Lola. One of Catalina's allies proves to be beyond her control. Inés succumbs to desperation.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Pedro learns about his wife's recent purchase. Alberto and Rebeca return to the mining camp. Constanza finds a familiar name in an unexpected place.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Pedro tells Catalina about his history with Constanza and makes a confession that forces her to rethink things. Juan helps Sol escape from the convent.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Catalina confides in Father Bartolomé, who gives her an invitation. Manolo proposes an idea to his mother. Inés extends an offer to Constanza.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Pedro tracks down Catalina. Manolo takes steps to ensure Juan won't ruin his plan. Alberto and Rebeca are brought to their new captors' leader.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Catalina decides whether to leave. Desperate for definitive proof of her husband's infidelity, Constanza targets Meneses and takes drastic measures.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Buendía shares his grand scheme with Alberto and Rebeca. Constanza tries to coerce Meneses into revealing what he knows about Pedro and Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Constanza learns Manolo has agreed to marry Sol — on one condition. Meneses calls off the investigation into Constanza's assault, raising suspicions.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Pedro puts his foot down with Constanza, who decides to pay a visit to Catalina to have a private conversation. Alonso admits something to Catalina.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: After discovering Juan has escaped, Manolo thinks of a way to get Sol to beg him to marry her right away. Alberto takes action to thwart Buendía's plan.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Sol and her mother work on convincing Pedro to allow an immediate wedding. Catalina and Alonso discuss affairs of the heart. Meneses is blackmailed.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Meneses makes a confession to Pedro. Just as Juan begins to recover, he learns it's Sol's wedding day. Buendía's men lose faith in their leader's plan.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Sol suddenly falls ill. Alberto awakens to find a letter nearby — and no Rebeca. Constanza plants the forged diary where Catalina will surely find it.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Sol grows suspicious of Manolo. Juan shows Inés what her son did to him. Constanza eagerly awaits to see what Catalina will do after reading the diary.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Alberto arrives back in Cartagena. Catalina reacts unexpectedly when Pedro confronts her about the slap. Manolo tells Sol the true reason she's ill.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Constanza tells Catalina of a surprise she's planning for Pedro. Manolo sneaks back into Cartagena to get medical help for Sol.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Sol overhears Manolo telling Alonso his true intentions. Alberto makes an alarming discovery in his wife's bedroom. Meneses's trial begins.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Olarte's widow testifies at the trial. Alberto asks to speak privately with Catalina. Juan reveals to Inés the significance of their new home.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Meneses makes a shocking confession to Constanza. Juan and Inés's relationship turns a corner. Catalina has a heart-to-heart talk with Alonso.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Alonso asks Manolo to make a decision based on what's best for Sol's health. Catalina advises Constanza on the best way to get revenge against Pedro.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca talks to Alberto about their future as a couple. Catalina asks Alonso who the father of Sol's baby is. Juan and Inés arrive back in Cartagena.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Catalina breaks the difficult news of Sol's pregnancy to Juan. Inés suspects something is going on between her husband and Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Inés confronts her son. Meneses gives his blackmailer intel. Pedro begs Catalina not to condemn Alonso and herself to an unhappy marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Alonso senses something is wrong with Catalina and demands the truth from her. Meneses's blackmailer and his men set out to intercept the gold shipment.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: At his trial, Pedro makes a statement that stuns the courtroom. Buendía and his new companions launch an attack on Cartagena.
episodes.title: Episode 60
